name: Validate emails from Google Forms submissions using Email List Verify and adding them to a Google Sheet spreadsheet
description: Every time a new Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically validate the email address in that form response using Email List Verify. If the email is not disposable, it will add a row with the data from that form to a Google Sheet. The example uses this [example sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12UPTjizUcS5_cNcdl3U_2FM4a7HJARSrSyiBsn5U3-Y/edit?usp=sharing).
